doc:
Amanda Randolph https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amanda_Randolph 0 Amanda E. Randolph (September 2, 1896 – August 24, 1967) was an American actress, singer and musician. She was the first African-American performer to star in a regularly scheduled network television show, appearing in DuMont's The Laytons. Amanda_E._Randolph ( September_2_,_1896 – August_24 , 1967 ) was an_American_actress , singer_and_musician . She was the_first_African-American_performer to_star in a_regularly_scheduled_network_television_show , appearing in DuMont 's_The_Laytons .
